Key Metrics: CAC, ROAS, CTR, CPC, Conversion Rate
Metric Definition: Customer Acquisition Cost, Return on Ad Spend, Click-through Rate, Cost per Click, Booking Conversion Rate
Measurement Method: Attribution tracking, UTM parameters, pixel tracking
Data Sources: Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok, Programmatic platforms, Internal booking system
Primary Use Case: Optimize ad spend allocation and campaign performance
Business Value: Reduce acquisition costs by 15-20%, improve ROAS

Key Metrics: First-touch attribution, Last-touch attribution, Multi-touch attribution, Channel overlap
Metric Definition: Credit assignment across marketing touchpoints for bookings
Measurement Method: Data-driven attribution models, cookie and user ID matching
Data Sources: All digital channels, CRM, Web analytics
Primary Use Case: Understand channel contribution and optimize budget allocation

Key Metrics: Impressions, Clicks, Spend, Bookings, Revenue, Frequency
Metric Definition: Campaign-level performance metrics with breakdown by creative, audience, placement
Measurement Method: Campaign tracking, conversion pixel, cohort analysis
Primary Use Case: Real-time campaign optimization and creative performance

Key Metrics: Organic traffic, Keyword rankings, Search visibility, Organic conversion rate
Metric Definition: Performance of non-paid search traffic and SEO efforts
Measurement Method: Search console data, ranking tools, organic conversion tracking
Data Sources: Google Search Console, SEMrush, Internal analytics
Primary Use Case: Optimize organic search strategy and content
Business Value: Reduce paid search dependency, increase organic traffic 30%

Key Metrics: Partner-driven bookings, Commission rates, Partner ROI, Partner lifetime value
Metric Definition: Performance of affiliate and partnership marketing channels
Measurement Method: Partner tracking links, commission tracking, revenue attribution
Data Sources: Affiliate networks, Partner APIs, Commission tracking systems
Primary Use Case: Manage partner relationships and optimize commission structures
Business Value: Diversify acquisition channels, reduce reliance on paid media

Key Metrics: Creative engagement rate, Creative fatigue index, A/B test results, Creative ROI
Metric Definition: Performance analysis of advertising creative assets
Measurement Method: Creative testing frameworks, engagement tracking, statistical testing
Data Sources: Creative management platforms, Ad platforms, A/B testing tools
Primary Use Case: Optimize creative strategy and prevent ad fatigue

Key Metrics: Funnel conversion rates, Drop-off points, Time to conversion, Funnel optimization opportunities
Metric Definition: Detailed analysis of user journey from search to booking
Measurement Method: Funnel tracking, event logging, cohort analysis
Data Sources: Web analytics, Mobile analytics, Backend booking system

Key Metrics: CLV by segment, CLV by acquisition channel, Repeat booking rate, Customer retention curves
Metric Definition: Comprehensive view of customer value over time
Measurement Method: Cohort analysis, statistical modeling, revenue tracking
Primary Use Case: Optimize customer acquisition and retention strategies

Key Metrics: Lead volume, Lead quality score, Lead-to-booking conversion, Time to conversion
Metric Definition: Tracking of potential customers through the consideration funnel
Measurement Method: Lead scoring, progressive profiling, conversion tracking
Primary Use Case: Optimize lead nurturing and qualification processes

Key Metrics: Cross-device users, Device switching patterns, Multi-device conversion paths
Metric Definition: Understanding how users interact across multiple devices
Measurement Method: Device fingerprinting, user ID matching, cross-device tracking
Data Sources: Web analytics, Mobile analytics, User identity platforms

Key Metrics: Monthly retention rate, Churn prediction score, Re-engagement success rate, Win-back campaigns
Metric Definition: Analysis of customer retention patterns and churn prevention
Measurement Method: Cohort analysis, predictive modeling, behavioral segmentation
Primary Use Case: Reduce churn and increase customer retention
Business Value: Reduce churn by 20%, increase retention by 15%

Key Metrics: Behavioral segments, Value-based segments, Lifecycle stage distribution, Segment performance
Metric Definition: Comprehensive customer segmentation and performance tracking
Measurement Method: Machine learning clustering, RFM analysis, behavioral tracking

Key Metrics: Total bookings revenue, Revenue per booking, Average daily rate (ADR), Revenue growth rate
Metric Definition: Core revenue metrics and growth tracking
Measurement Method: Revenue tracking, statistical analysis, cohort analysis
Data Sources: Booking system, Payment processing, Financial systems
Primary Use Case: Monitor business performance and revenue trends
Business Value: Track toward revenue goals, identify growth opportunities

Key Metrics: Unit contribution margin, Payback period, LTV/CAC ratio, Gross margin per booking
Metric Definition: Detailed profitability analysis at unit level
Measurement Method: Financial modeling, cost allocation, margin analysis
Data Sources: Financial systems, Cost centers, Booking system
Primary Use Case: Understand profitability and optimize unit economics

Key Metrics: Market share, Competitive pricing analysis, Demand forecasting, Market penetration
Metric Definition: Performance analysis by geographic and demographic markets
Measurement Method: Market research, competitive intelligence, demand modeling
Data Sources: Market research tools, Competitive data, Internal analytics
Primary Use Case: Optimize market strategy and expansion decisions
Business Value: Identify new market opportunities, optimize pricing

Key Metrics: Host earnings, Listing utilization, Host retention rate, Supply quality metrics
Metric Definition: Performance metrics for supply-side of marketplace
Measurement Method: Host analytics, listing performance tracking, quality scoring
Data Sources: Host platform, Listing management, Quality systems
Primary Use Case: Optimize host experience and supply quality
Business Value: Increase host satisfaction and supply quality

Key Metrics: Seasonal demand patterns, Peak booking periods, Capacity utilization, Demand elasticity
Metric Definition: Analysis of seasonal trends and demand patterns
Measurement Method: Time series analysis, demand forecasting, capacity modeling
Data Sources: Booking system, External data sources, Historical analytics
